name: Aldric Swiftarrow

custom_features.name: Favored Enemy: Goblinoids
custom_features.description: You have chosen goblinoids (goblins, hobgoblins, and bugbears) as your favored enemy type.

custom_features.name: Natural Explorer: Forest
custom_features.description: You have chosen forest as your favored terrain type.

custom_features.name: Fighting Style: Archery
custom_features.description: You have chosen Archery as your ranger fighting style.

custom_features.name: Hunter's Prey: Colossus Slayer
custom_features.description: You have chosen Colossus Slayer as your Hunter's Prey feature.

traits: I place no stock in wealthy or well-mannered folk. Money and manners won't save you from a hungry owlbear.
I'm always picking things up, absently fiddling with them, and sometimes accidentally breaking them.
ideals: Nature. The natural world is more important than all the constructs of civilization.
bonds: I will bring terrible wrath down on the evildoers who destroyed my homeland.
flaws: I am too enamored of ale, wine, and other intoxicants.

backstory: Aldric Swiftarrow grew up in the forests of the Wood Elf homeland, learning the ways of nature and the bow. When goblinoid raiders destroyed his village, he took up the mantle of a ranger to protect others from the same fate. He now wanders the borderlands, keeping watch for evil and helping those in need.
